name: Comm100 X2 Tickets Dark
description: Dark theme for Comm100 X2 Tickets only, not meant for chat
additional_info:
Release notes: This style is not great, I am not a web dev.

License: none. do whatever.

Instructions:
For Chrome browser.
In Ticket & Messaging window click "Launch Agent Console"
This will popup the Ticketing app window. After logging in, right click the top bar to get a Chrome menu and click "Show as tab"
Now you have access to the full Chrome menu and all your plugins.
Import this style to Stylus.

Unrelated:
You can turn Comm100 back into an app window (after you are done updating Stylus) by clicking the Chrome menu, More Tools, Create shortcut, check Open as Window and click Create. Now Comm100 will be an app window and have its own icon in your taskbar.
